additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 1150 health, 4.5 health regen and 45 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 1150 health and 4.5 health regen.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 1150 health and 4.5 health regen.

The max-health-based health regen bonus from multiple Hearts of Tarrasque does not stack. Can regenerate up to 96% of the wielder's max health in one minute. Can fully regenerate the wielder's health within 62.5 seconds.

name: Heart of Tarrasque
description: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
trivia: The name "Tarrasque" references the Tarrasque, an almost undefeatable monster in Dungeons & Dragons, which in return references the Tarasque, a mythological dragon-hybrid that was tamed by Saint Martha.
tips: Heart of Tarrasque is effective against teams with a lot of burst damage.
Heart of Tarrasque's strength bonus mostly benefits strength heroes. Agility or Intelligence heroes can consider an Eye of Skadi instead for tankiness.
Heart of Tarrasque can quickly regenerate health after a team fight, allowing wielders to continue with other deeds without having to visit the Fountain to refill their health.
